name: Rohit Bharat Akulwar
title: Software Developer
objective: Aspiring software developer with a strong focus on AI applications and automation systems. Detail-oriented problem solver with excellent analytical thinking and adaptability in rapidly evolving tech environments. Experienced in workflow automation using n8n, creating intelligent pipelines that streamline complex processes. Actively exploring AI-driven image and video generation, with growing expertise in prompt engineering and model integration. Passionate about developing scalable AI solutions and leveraging automation to enhance productivity and creative workflows through collaborative innovation and continuous learning.
education_3_degree: Maharashtra State Board of Secondary & Higher Secondary Education
education_3_institution: NESS WADIA COLLEGE OF COMMERCE (JR. COLLEGE)
education_4_degree: Maharashtra State Board of Secondary & Higher Secondary Education
project_1_title: Automated Data Analytics Pipeline using n8n
project_1_description: Developed a comprehensive data analytics automation pipeline using n8n that integrates multiple APIs to collect, process, and analyze business data in real-time. Created automated data extraction workflows from various sources with advanced data transformation capabilities and dynamic report generation featuring interactive charts and visualizations.
project_1_technologies: n8n, Gemini API, AI Agent Integration, Data Visualization, Quickchart.io
project_2_description: Built an AI-powered automated content aggregation and workflow system using n8n, leveraging RSS feeds and custom API integrations to scrape, filter, and organize real-time articles from multiple websites. Implemented intelligent content processing with NLP-based classification and topic extraction, enabling automated categorization into domains like finance, mental health, and tech. Designed a clean frontend in JSX to display categorized articles, trending topics, and workflow results in an intuitive dashboard.
project_2_technologies: n8n, RSS Feeds, Node.js, JSX Frontend, API Integrations, NLP-Based Classification, Automation Workflows, AI/LLM Processing
project_3_description: A 2D Indie Platformer built in Python using the PyGame Library. Includes multiple levels and stages with unique Boss Fights and their respective stages. Used Sprites and a Level Builder to build the World.
project_4_description: A full-stack E-Commerce application built with the MERN stack and TypeScript. Includes a responsive customer storefront with a shopping cart, product filtering, and secure checkout, alongside a comprehensive Admin Dashboard for inventory and user management. Features JWT authentication, image uploads, and automated email notifications with a modern Neo-Brutalist UI.
project_4_technologies: React, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Vite
